name: Spacewar (itch) (TheClockworks)
description:
Made for a Game Gen class to learn the basics of how to use Construct 3. A simple clone of the original Space Wars.

In this game your goal is to shoot down the other player's space ship before they can do the same to you.

Player one is controlled with W,A,D, and F. Player two is controlled with the arrow keys and the . key.

 Hostiles Inbound by Miguel Johnson | https://soundcloud.com/migueljohnsonmjmusic

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
